attributes.action: Government Guarantee Peer to Peer Loans
attributes.additional_details:
Money to Burn? Neither have I and true inflation is over 3%. Our banks -
1. Award themselves obscene bonuses
2. Make vast profits, often from miss-selling
3. Are protected by us from their catastrophes
4. Lend small businesses barely a pittance
5. Pay us derisory interest on savings
A disgrace that has not been satisfactorily addressed.
The Treasury will refund us up to £85,000 per ‘failed’ account, from our own taxes
to keep investing in this corrupt financial system. The Government should make:
The SAME £85,000 GUARANTEE for PEER TO PEER LOANS
So we can fund getting Britain back to work, while not seeing our hard won savings
wither weekly, or even weakly.  Sound investment? Face up or tweet your friends.
